# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(hazy STATIC 
  hazy.c
  hazy_decider.c
  hazy_direction.c
  hazy_latency.c
  hazy_packets.c
  hazy_transport.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(hazy)

target_include_directories(hazy PUBLIC ../include)


target_link_libraries(hazy PUBLIC 
  clog
  datagram-transport
  monotonic-time
  discoid)
